title: While Delhi Is Choking, Shah Rukh Khan Still Wants Son AbRam To See Dilli Ki Diwali This Year
text:
While Delhi Is Choking, Shah Rukh Khan Still Wants Son AbRam To See Dilli Ki Diwali This Year

While Delhi Is Choking, Shah Rukh Khan Still Wants Son AbRam To See Dilli Ki Diwali This Year

It’s the season of festivals and also air pollution. Just like past couple of years, this year as well, the air pollution in the National Captial Region (NCR) has become a cause of concern.

Twitter

While the Air Quality Index this year isn’t as bad as last year, it is predicted that it will rise from ‘very poor’ to ‘severe’ on Diwali today.

The pollution level is shooting up. For the unversed, AQI between 0 and 50 is considered 'good', 51 and 100 'satisfactory', 101 and 200 'moderate', 201 and 300 'poor', 301 and 400 'very poor', and 401 and 500 'severe'.

Twitter

Don't Miss

But the celebrations in Delhi are on full swing. People are enthusiastic, and so is Shah Rukh Khan. The superstar who was brought up in Delhi says there Dilli Ki Diwali is the best, and so, he is here to celebrate the festival with his son AbRam.

Twitter

“I would love to celebrate Diwali in Delhi. Par humare Mumbai meing Diwali ki badi-badi parties hoti hain. Toh wahan jana lazmi hai. Who ek culture sa bann chukka hai. I have to rush back, but I’m here till Diwali. I have got my little son (AbRam) here with me. So, I’ll be taking him around the city, showing him Dilli Ki Diwali. Mujhe aisa lagta hai Diwali, Dussehra aur Holi jaise Dilli mein hota hai, kahin aur nahi hota. Ya phir mera yeh apna lagaav hai mujhe aisa lagta hai,” he was quoted as saying by TOI.

Twitter

While currently, the AQI in Delhi is ‘very poor’, it is expected to turn ‘severe’ after Diwali. But, it is said that it will be better than 2018. Last year, post Diwali, AQI of Delhi was 642, which falls in the "severe plus emergency" category.
